But how does a hotel that taps into the minds of millennials cause others to get so angry that they feel the need to throw bricks? Is it the microgreens growing on the rooftop? Maybe it is the brand’s decision to only source sustainable produce and seafood, or to only use its own carbonated in-house filtered water.

【6/4（一）12:00 開放售票】g0v 第拾壹次基礎建設「傍晚熱炒晚上松」ft. Frank Pasquale & Ray Cha
slackbot1's url: [g0v 第拾壹次基礎建設「傍晚熱炒晚上松」 ft. Frank Pasquale & Ray Cha]
本次 g0v 基礎建設松將有兩段短講：分別是《黑箱社會：掌控信息和金錢的數據法則》作者 Frank Pasquale，以及曾於 EDGI（Environmental Data & Governance Initiative，環境資料與政府行動，監測美國聯邦政府環境機構網頁的組織）任職的 Ray Cha。在短講之後，歡迎沒有人提案、交流或自由 hacking。
什麼是 g0v 基礎建設松？
